#include <iostream>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll a, b, count, f1, f2, temp;
    while(1)
    {
    	cin>>a>>b;
    	if(a==0 || b==0) 
    		break;
    	count=0;
    	f1=1, f2=2;
       	while (1) {
          if(f1>b) break;
          if(f1>=a) count++;
          temp=f1;
          f1=f2;
          f2+=temp;
       }
       cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
